channel.title: fun on Dan Aukes
channel.description: Recent content in fun on Dan Aukes

item.title: Looping Video into Zoom
item.description: sudo apt-get install v4l2loopback-dkms v4l-utils ls /dev/video* sudo modprobe v4l2loopback video_nr=9 card_label=“virtual-cam” ffmpeg -stream_loop -1 -re -i 2020-10-01-110554.

item.title: OpenCV Photobooth
item.description: A qt5 gui and opencv make it possible to make your own photobooth at home!

item.title: The Night Behind Christmas
item.description: ‘Twas two nights before Christmas, and all through the house,
